text:
Mirga Gražinytė-Tyla (born Mirga Gražinytė, 29 August 1986 in Vilnius) is a Lithuanian conductor. She is currently music director of the City of Birmingham Symphony Orchestra (CBSO) in England. She was nominated for the 2020 Grammy Award for Best Orchestral Performance.
On 14 March 2020, Gražinytė-Tyla was tested positive for COVID-19.

annotations.surface_form: Grammy Award for Best Orchestral Performance
